Icon.Name: ID66168
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:66168 48.11,3.59,-18.77 Level 114^^^ clockwork - Needed for 'Propehcies of Innovation I [Solo]'. - Becomes attackable upon defeating the Ancient Clockwork Prototype. - After it is defeated you see the spirit of Meldrath running through the previously locked door to the north to The Glitched Guardian 10101. - Joust 20m from tank when the Scrounger detects a short circuit.

Icon.Name: ID66169
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:66169 206.61,3.42,-152.46 Level 114^^^ clockwork - Needed for 'Propehcies of Innovation I [Solo]'. - The electromagnetic pulse upon its death charges your [Ancient Clockwork Hand] into a [Electro-Charged Clockwork Hand], needed to open the locked door at 136, 3, -45. - Joust out when he overheats, defeat adds to stop him from healing.

Icon.Name: ID67709
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:67709 -82.81,-38.61,-174.54 Level 120^^^ Epic x4 undead froglok - An endless stream of ghouls comes up from the Font of the Everliving up the stairs and goes down the ramp to the east. At the bottom of this curved ramp they despawn. Follow one of them down the eastern ramp and keep using your [Restored Chalice of Valor] to banish the ones that come up from behind and the static groups on the sides. Once Froppit has been banished the pool will stop spawning more of them.

Icon.Name: ID67710

Icon.Name: ID67712
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:67712 -52.00,-42.97,-258.54 There are three wall plates that can be pushed. All 3 need to be pushed in and the sequence can vary. Try pushing in one of them, and if it pops back out, try one of the other two. Eventually, you will figure out the order that they want to be pushed in, and they will stay in. This opens a door to the east on this platform.

Icon.Name: ID67713

Icon.Name: ID69866
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69866 1379.24,789.02,93.38 The four nameds come one by one first named: "Council of Gravel": use the "Severed Ethereal Gravel" on pull and when the named has the buff at 20 again second named: "Council of Stone" 50% chance to absorb damage, calls adds and has a KB third named: "Council of Soil" when your power is below 10% you get an unresistable fear last named: "Council of Leaves" calls small non attackable adds that can stun/stifle

Icon.Name: ID69867
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69867 862.45,62.54,41.22 use the "Severed Ethereal Gravel" on pull and when the named has the buff at 40 again

Icon.Name: ID68310
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68310 944.27,62.62,40.00 Place your [Ethereal Gravel] here, then watch, in order, through which 3 doors the floating ethereal gravel paths and repeat that order. - Passing the test severs the plane's link to the Ethereal Gravel, so that you can take some [Severed Ethereal Gravel] needed for the Council of Gravel.

Icon.Name: ID68311
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68311 999.47,62.62,-1.68 For the Test of Gravel watch, in order, through which of these 3 doors the floating ethereal gravel paths. In order to pass the test you have to go through the same doors in the same order that the gravel pathed. Clicking an access point will teleport you to the point where you saw the next gravel spawn. - This is a group update, so let 1 player do it.

Icon.Name: ID68333
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68333 1110.22,274.93,39.83 Upon placing your [Ethereal Stones] here, 4 soldiers of stone spawn, note the doors the outer 3 are standing near, then note in which order you kill those 3 and after the fight walk through the doors in the same order. - This is a group update, so let 1 player do it. - Passing the test severs the plane's link to the Ethereal Stones, so that you can take some [Severed Ethereal Stones] needed for the Council of Stone.

Icon.Name: ID68334
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68334 1170.41,274.93,-1.84 The northern soldier of stone spawns here for Test of Stone. After the fight, depending on wether the northern soldier of stone was defeated first, second or third walk through this door first, second or third (in the same order). - Making the doors hum to pass the test is a group update, so let 1 player do it.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68351 645.45,14.09,-454.21 Traverse the ruins back up to The Earthen Way on level 3. - Spawns upon defeating Ecargore and the Guardian of Soil.

Icon.Name: ID68352
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68352 1274.00,465.20,39.78 Upon placing your [Ethereal Soil] here 3 soil mounds and 3 earthly podwalkers spawn. You have to defeat each earthly podwalker over the corresponding mound. Repeat this process with 3 waters of Awuidor and 3 flits of radiance - Passing the test severs the plane's link to the Ethereal Soil, so that you can take some [Severed Ethereal Soil] needed for the Council of Soil.

Icon.Name: ID68353
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68353 1331.75,466.85,23.15 Defeat the northern earthly podwalker, waters of Awuidor and flit of radiance over this mound. Upon doing so an ethereal plant will grow from which you can take [Ethereal Leaves] - Passing the test also severs the plane's link to the Ethereal Soil, so that you can take some [Severed Ethereal Soil].

Icon.Name: ID68354
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68354 1335.53,466.76,55.10 Defeat the southern earthly podwalker, waters of Awuidor and flit of radiance over this mound. Upon doing so an ethereal plant will grow from which you can take [Ethereal Leaves] - Passing the test also severs the plane's link to the Ethereal Soil, so that you can take some [Severed Ethereal Soil].

Icon.Name: ID68357
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68357 1498.19,635.08,39.74 6 grouped level 118 arborians with their forest familiars - Spawn upon placing your [Ethereal Leaves] on the Test of Leaves and spawn Lesha Needleleaf upon defeat.

Icon.Name: ID69831
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69831 2.68,8.44,123.00 Level 117^^^ clockwork. - Saryrn's minion needs to be defeated for the PoP SQ 'Legacy of Power: Tyrant' Throne'. - Spawns upon defeating all elite Sullonite umbrants.

Icon.Name: ID69832
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69832 -25.02,23.61,140.05 He is spending all his energy empowering the Dresolik (aka reformed Chaos Stone), until exhaustion.

Icon.Name: ID69833
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69833 -10.30,24.36,174.01 - This is the reformed Chaos Stone and is being empowered by Fennin Ro, so that Lanys T'Vyl can built the Time Portal. - After defeating The Blood Primordial activate it to cause an explosion that will take out Lanys with the Dresolik for the PoP SQ 'Legacy of Power: Tyrant' Throne' and the mission 'The Tyrant's Throne [Solo]'. - Everyone to the north will be protected by a shield that the Ro's are creating.

Icon.Name: ID69834
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69834 2.73,24.35,202.02 She is constructing the Time Portal with the energy of the reformed Chaos Stone that is being empowered by Fennin Ro.

Icon.Name: ID69836
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69836 -19.09,-0.39,61.10 Teleports around while fighting The Blood Primordial to tip the odds in the Primordials favor by rooting you and is then engaged by Morell-Thule.

Icon.Name: ID69837
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69837 -19.60,0.23,71.28 As a god of your allegiance he engages Saryrn to stop her meddeling in your fight with the Blood Primordial.

Icon.Name: ID69838
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69838 1808.06,693.73,790.09 Leads back out to the "Coliseum of Valor".

Icon.Name: ID69844
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69844 1806.61,710.40,975.30 - Final update for the PoP SQ 'Legacy of Power: Tyrant' Throne'. - After the explosion all the gods of the allegiance together with Fennin and Solusek Ro chat about what happened and you can see that half of the Throne together with the Dresolik and the Time Portal got destroyed. - The destruction of Lanys T'Vyl also caused little Essences of Hate to be flung all across the area.

Icon.Name: ID73409
Icon.Tooltip: Burrtoe the Gorged <Master o' da Halfies!>

Icon.Name: ID73447
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:73447 -100.32,2.06,-154.36 Rare spawn, kill all beetles, needed for an achievement

Icon.Name: ID73414
Icon.Tooltip: High Shaman Vohan <Master o' da Pazt>

Icon.Name: ID69933
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69933 -21.00,-4.00,-174.00 Level 118^^^ goblin. - Fighting him in the tent will protect you from being knocked around by the sand tornados he spawns.

Icon.Name: ID69934
Icon.Tooltip: Burrtoe the Gorged <Master o' da Halfies!>

Icon.Name: ID69935
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69935 218.18,-31.02,-153.95 Level 118^^^ goblin. - It is advised to be standing on something to get out of the effects of the gas he passes. - He will fear the group shortly after announcing "Run run! Go play with da gassy gasses!".

Icon.Name: ID69936
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69936 134.78,-16.00,174.15 Level 118^^^ goblin. - Turns aggro after a monologue that he starts upon entering the vault. - Spawns an additional group of Bergo the Dirty, Gahdash the Backstabbie, Grunblug Foesmasher and Usla the Fleshscorcher (level 118^^^ goblins) who prevent him from dieing if not defeated.
Icon.Tooltip: High Shaman Vohan <Master o' da Pazt>

Icon.Name: ID69937
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69937 -100.32,2.06,-154.36 Level 118^^^ beetle. - Rare Named that drops a small chest full of platinum.

Icon.Name: ID69938
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69938 -25.39,8.54,-2.67 Level 118^^^ goblin. - On top of the dead eyeball in the middle of the room.

Icon.Name: ID69939
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69939 102.42,-16.00,-239.93 Level 118^^^ goblin. - If left alive Malleg will call the other boars in the area at 50% health. - Wanders around in the pen.

Icon.Name: ID69940
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69940 -120.48,-0.04,75.10 Level 118^^^ evil eye. - Triggered spawn running up the spiral ramp it will end up here if not intercepted before.

Icon.Name: ID69941
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69941 180.05,-16.94,192.30 Leads back out to the "Myrist, the Great Library".

Icon.Name: ID69942
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69942 -102.03,-27.77,47.25 Leads back out to the "Myrist, the Great Library".

Icon.Name: ID69944
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69944 -58.01,0.11,57.20 Discovery location. - On the bridge above the pool, reached by the spiral ramp.

Icon.Name: ID69945
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69945 -18.13,-6.00,-197.41 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID69946
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69946 -25.06,0.08,39.05 This locked door can be opened with your [Key to Runnyeye].

Icon.Name: ID69947
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69947 98.99,-16.03,-223.99 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID69948
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69948 161.48,-16.00,-189.09 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID69949
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69949 201.08,-40.70,-150.70 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID69950
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69950 151.46,-16.03,173.75 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID69951
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69951 167.29,-15.95,-36.01 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID69952
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69952 216.48,-15.95,35.41 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID69953
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69953 203.42,-15.95,123.16 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID69954
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69954 -92.31,0.98,-77.67 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID69955
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69955 -37.77,0.00,57.44 - The [Key to Runnyeye] can be looted from this or the other slain goblins and is needed to open the doors in the zone, once looted the key stays with you and even works when left in the bank. - This is the same key as the one form the original "Runnyeye: The Gathering".

Icon.Name: ID69956
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69956 -29.21,1.00,11.21 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID70006
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70006 -66.72,-354.00,95.27 Leads back out to "Myrist, the Great Library".

Icon.Name: ID70007
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70007 -100.59,-355.90,95.40 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID70008
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70008 -91.02,-381.49,-13.68 Level 117^ golem. - Leaves an Icecrete Snowpile behind where it was defeated that can be gathered to receive an [Icecrete Shield] needed for the fight against Glimmerghast. - Roams the Ward and respawns shortly after its defeated.

Icon.Name: ID70009
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70009 -95.68,-382.36,-31.84 - Discovery location. - The ice in the lower part is slippery.

Icon.Name: ID70010
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70010 -171.13,-370.08,178.17 Level 117^ planar elemental. - Leaves Chillsoot Ember behind where it was defeated that can be gathered to receive [chillsoot ember] 4 of which are needed to throw them at Glimmerghast in the Foyer to make it attackable. - Roams up to here before retuning to the other roaming dervishes in the Abandoned Garrison. - Respawns.

Icon.Name: ID70012
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70012 -88.48,-354.69,96.00 Level 117^ planar elemental. - Spawned by throwing your [chillsoot ember]s at it. - Use your [Icecrete Shield] before and periodically during the fight to reduce the damage it deals out. - The fog barrier is removed upon its defeat.

Icon.Name: ID70013
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70013 -210.70,-354.00,94.31 This barrier is removed upon defeating Glimmerghast.

Icon.Name: ID70014
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70014 -297.12,-383.66,167.90 Gather this gem to receive 1 of 5 [cinder gem]s needed to spawn Cinderstench.

Icon.Name: ID70015
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70015 -300.48,-383.67,192.06 Gather this paper to receive 1 of 4 [tattered paper]s needed to spawn Cinderstench.

Icon.Name: ID70022
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70022 -305.85,-370.93,65.13 This barrier is removed upon defeating Cursemuck.

Icon.Name: ID70024
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70024 -231.64,-349.28,-47.50 Level 117^ planar air elemental. - Leaves a Wellstone behind where it was defeated that can be gathered to receive [Wellstone Spout] needed for the fight against Blazeanger. - Has a proximity knockback and respawns.

Icon.Name: ID70025
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70025 -238.00,-355.00,1.00 Level 117^ golem. - Like all flamestone furies this needs to be defeated to raise the bridges to the central platform in the well and make Blazeanger attackable.

Icon.Name: ID70026
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70026 -229.20,-363.67,-100.42 This ramp leads down into the well containing Blazeanger.

Icon.Name: ID70027
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70027 -296.21,-426.51,-31.47 This ramp leads back up to the surface.

Icon.Name: ID70028
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70028 -274.11,-440.37,-55.64 - 1 of 4 bridges that are raised after all flamestone furies have been defeated. - These will fall away while Blazeanger is engaged.

Icon.Name: ID70029
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70029 -273.06,-439.96,-75.93 Level 117^ dragon. - Use your [Wellstone Spout] on it whenever its ill temper is back. - Leaves a chunk of Blazeanger behind that can be used to get back to the surface quickly. - Becomes attackable once the stone bridges have been raised. - The flame barrier is removed upon its defeat. - Wanders the central platform on which it has to be fought as the stone bridges will fall away once he is engaged.

Icon.Name: ID70030
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70030 -266.99,-440.58,-75.89 This chunk that broke off upon defeating Blazeanger will kick you high up into the air upon inspecting it to return quicker to the surface.

Icon.Name: ID70031
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70031 -341.82,-375.99,126.05 This barrier is removed upon defeating Blazeanger.

Icon.Name: ID70032
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70032 -394.97,-401.35,86.67 Gather this scroll to receive [Filtered Breath] needed to defeat Cinderstench.

Icon.Name: ID70033
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70033 -401.62,-402.28,77.50 Discovery location.

Icon.Name: ID70034
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70034 -271.06,-370.05,101.20 This tunnel leads to the upper floor containing the Ward of Floods and Storms.

Icon.Name: ID70036
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70036 -401.33,-402.28,60.77 Throw your [tattered paper]s and [cinder gem]s into this fire to spawn Cinderstench.

Icon.Name: ID70037
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70037 -401.00,-400.00,61.00 Level 117^ planar elemental. - Spawned by throwing your [tattered paper]s and [cinder gem]s into the Fires of Knowledge. - Use your [Filtered Breath] to clear the Toxic Mist when it overwhelmes your senses. - Will call all wildfires that were not defeated from this room and the Ward of Fire and Flame to its aid. - The chaos barrier is removed upon its defeat.

Icon.Name: ID70038
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70038 -408.53,-400.25,81.65 Level 117^ planar elemental. - This wildfire like all other wildfires should be defeated to prevent it from being called to aid by Cinderstench.

Icon.Name: ID70039
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70039 -418.27,-391.39,126.17 This barrier is removed upon defeating Cinderstench.

Icon.Name: ID70041
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70041 -479.00,-410.00,125.00 Level 117^ planar elemental. - This roaming storm and the 4 stationary ones need to be defeated to activate the lift.

Icon.Name: ID70042
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70042 -482.69,-410.13,131.26 Step on this switch to call the lift back down if it is up.

Icon.Name: ID70043
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70043 -489.90,-408.61,126.01 - This lift takes you to The Edifice of Ascension on the top end of the tower. - Unlocked by defeating the chaos storms.

Icon.Name: ID70018
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70018 -176.00,-328.74,132.68 Level 117^ golem. - Its body can be picked up to be moved to the southern part of the pool upon defeating it to spawn Cursemuck.

Icon.Name: ID70019
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70019 -153.00,-328.00,162.00 Level 117^ planar air elemental. - Leaves a shock wisp behind where it was defeated that can be gathered to receive [Fulgurite Strike] needed for the fight against Cursemuck. - Roams around the tesla tower which turns off when both tempests around it have been defeated.

Icon.Name: ID70020
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70020 -93.45,-329.86,212.55 Move the bodies of 4 ballast stone rumblers to this pool to spawn Cursemuck.

Icon.Name: ID70021
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70021 -89.67,-330.17,188.91 Level 117^ golem. - Use your [Fulgurite Strike] on it whenever its shaken off. - Spawned by placing 4 ballast stone rumbler remains in the southern part fo the pool. - Runs around the whole pool after spawning. - The rock barrier is removed upon its defeat.

Icon.Name: ID70035
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70035 -198.51,-328.14,155.70 This tunnel leads back down to the main floor.

Icon.Name: ID70044
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70044 -490.05,-179.69,126.01 - This lift will take you back down to the Atrium of Chaos on the Main Floor. - It will go down automatically upon engaing Najena and reappear upon her defeat.

Icon.Name: ID70045
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70045 -504.32,-178.73,104.74 Level 118^^ dark elf. - Needed for the CD SQ 'Elements of Destruction: Face the Chaos'. - She becomes attackable after a monologue upon approaching her. - She will respawn the nameds you have defeated before: Glimmerghast at 85%, Cursemuck at 65%, Blazeanger at 45% and Cinderstench at 25%. - Make sure to use the appropriate spell for each named as before and use your [Icecrete Shield] to reduce overall incoming damage and your [Filtered Breath] to regain health and power. - At 5% health she will teleport herself out in defeat. - Upon defeat the lift will be raised again and an exit portal will appear.

Icon.Name: ID70046
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70046 -489.92,-179.12,136.53 Discovery location. - Needed for the CD SQ 'Elements of Destruction: Face the Chaos'.

Icon.Name: ID70047
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70047 -472.59,-178.49,102.16 Level 117^ planar elemental. - Spawns from this green earthen portal when Najena gets to 25% health. - Use your [Filtered Breath] to clear the Toxic Mist when it overwhelmes your senses.

Icon.Name: ID70048
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70048 -461.64,-178.41,135.17 Level 117^ planar elemental. - Spawns from this white fog portal when Najena gets to 85% health.. - Use your [Icecrete Shield] before and periodically during the fight to reduce the damage it deals out.

Icon.Name: ID70049
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70049 -518.38,-178.45,135.40 Level 117^ golem. - Spawns from this purple chaos portal when Najena gets to 65% health. - Use your [Fulgurite Strike] on it whenever its shaken off.

Icon.Name: ID70050
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70050 -489.97,-178.49,155.54 Level 117^ dragon. - Spawns from this red fire portal when Najena gets to 45% health. - Use your [Wellstone Spout] on it whenever its ill temper is back.

Icon.Name: ID70051
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70051 -509.17,-178.14,99.00 Leads back out to "Myrist, the Great Library". - Spawns upon defeating Najena.

Icon.Name: ID68380
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68380 1002.57,-310.11,250.38 Takes you back out to the Aerie.

Icon.Name: ID68381
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68381 1013.53,-310.11,208.49 - In order to free her from her chains you need to drag the chaotic tempests over her. - Once she is freed she is coerced to attack you as Aerieyal the Bewitched (level 118^^^ harpy). - Upon defeating Prosperon the Tempest she turns into Aerieyal the Free and flies away.

Icon.Name: ID68382
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:68382 1006.31,-310.11,210.51 Level 118^^^ wilder. - Needed for 'Elements of Wind [Solo]' and 'Study of Air: Empty Nests [Solo]'. - Circles around Aerieyal the Subjugated. - His tempests knock you around. After freeing Aerieyal you can run through the Light of Aerieyal (yellow globes) to receive a temporary buff that allows you to defeat him.

Icon.Name: ID70188
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70188 1035.05,-310.10,216.88 roams around in the whole area

Icon.Name: ID76433
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:76433 -682.00,403.00,-163.00 Comes with two linked adds

Icon.Name: ID76436
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:76436 -322.54,4530.00,-145.00 Transport to "The Northern Overlook"

Icon.Name: ID76438
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:76438 -653.93,525.16,-324.46 Take a bath in honey to call Bzzkill
